data.app_name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable - Early Access
data.description:
**Now available in Early Access!**


Prepare for combat with Omni-Directional Mobility Gear and fly head-first into battle! Defy all odds and eliminate the Titans!


Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable, the first-person action-adventure VR platformer based on the highly acclaimed manga “Attack on Titan” and the latest installment of the VR series. 

Join the Scout Regiment as an aspiring recruit and help defend mankind from the Titan invasion.


# Omni-Directional Mobility Gear
Utilize the Omni-Directional Mobility Gear to maneuver through the air and combat the onslaught of Titans! 
{1195760871453526}


# The Titan Threat
Titans rely on their instincts to hunt humans and satisfy their insatiable appetites.
Overcome the fear of death and lay waste to the Titan army!
{1042373100565202}


# Distinct Weapons
Each weapon offers unique characteristics that can alter the course of battle and how it is approached!
{469443659357575}
{1280368342833344}


# Roadmap
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38984470_1529176937991447_6731511555124357528_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RfMeSdDl2fIQ7kNvgE95PRP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA1viHcXqBH8Fu2wB-W2FSgTeJ2FlugVq5a_h5dQhgRxQ&oe=66A78613)
Early Access will consist of the first two chapters.
There will also be free update support through Early Access and 1.0.
The second half of the campaign and mulit-player co-op support will release alongside 1.0 later in 2024.
